Explanation:  
For transaction ID "Sale20240112045," the recorded type is incorrectly marked as "Purchase," while the invoice description and other details indicate it is a "Sale." The recorded date is also inconsistent with the invoice description (2024-01-21 instead of 2024-01-12). All other fields align with a Sale transaction, so the category and date are corrected accordingly.
